wikipedia_page.main:
Thomas McBride is a footballer from Derry, Northern Ireland who plays for Northern Ireland Intermediate League club Newbuildings United.
He previously played with Derry City, had 2 stints at Finn Harps and was a youth player for Northampton Town. McBride was also selected for the Northern Ireland Under-18 Schoolboys in 2010. However, he went on to represent the Republic of Ireland at under 19 level.

response: * Thomas McBride (footballer) (born 1992), footballer from Derry, Northern Ireland
